narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Foot & Wound Care of Indio is a Medicaid provider based in Indio, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $14.1M in Medicaid payments across 3K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $14.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
